DOC.detailed_description: Antiphospholipid Syndrome ( APS ) autoimmune disorder blood clot pregnancy loss . It associate protein call antiphospholipid antibody ( aPL ) blood . Blood clot disease occur several reason ; one reason involve interaction aPL another protein find surface cell line blood vessel ( endothelial cell ) . This protein , call annexin A5 ( AnxA5 ) , form shield surface cell . The AnxA5 Resistance Assay blood test detect problem protective AnxA5 shield endothelial cell surface . This 12 week study observe patient persistent aPL blood start medicine call hydroxychloroquine ( HCQ ) . The primary goal study compare result AnxA5 resistance assay patient start take HCQ take 12 week see result blood test change . Our secondary goal measure variety blood test patient start take HCQ ; test include D-dimer , Activated Protein C ( APC ) Resistance , aPL titers/status ( LA test , aCL ELISA , aß2GPI ELISA , anti-Domain-I ß2GPI ELISA ) .
